website_summaries.verdict: A good deal on a uniquely designed board that you can write on to label each cheese.
pros: Natural slate design that fits almost any decor
Smooth surface and no-slip "feet" for easy use and cleanup
Can write on it for custom design and labeling
cons: No bells or whistles, and chalk could get on the food

customer_reviews.title: Keep the packaging for storing after use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for food photography setup. After just a few shoots the scuffs on this seemed to multiple very quickly. Expect to photoshop these marks. Keep the foam from the original packaging and box to protect when storing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as thick as advertized! Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just okay. It's pretty thin and the sides are sharp. The raw look is cool, but maybe not that raw, as in maybe safe to handle? I filed them just enough that the very edge isn't as sharp but without altering the look.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: Versatile piece
customer_reviews.text: I know this is supposed to be used for cheese or fruit, but I am using this on a short steel plant stand. It looks really awesome and is very well made. I am probably going to get another one for its true intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DirtDiva

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any Cheese Lover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Slate Cheese Board! The Quality is great and it comes with chalk to write, the velvet bottom makes it non-slippery and it‘s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Raysik

customer_reviews.title: The board came very well packaged and two days earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The round slate cheeseboard was exactly what I was shopping for! It is serving as a dual purpose, not only has a serving platter but also as a large coaster on a small round table top to protect the wood from drinks and moisture! It is well made and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not for long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cheeseboard version and loved it at first. After some used, I noticed that it is not easy to clean. The stations do not come off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift so I don’t know much about it. It looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: NANOS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and just what I needed! I put it on top of a rustic metal container to make a small table on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful way to serve cheese/snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very pretty & appears to be very functional! Will get lots of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: jaguarlady

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for appetizer accessories
customer_reviews.text: I love making cheese and meat boards and this was the perfect addition for a great presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Rideman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking server
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple and very cool cheese board. I purchased this for a bridal shower gift along with a cheese knife set. I think the bride to be (and hubby to be) will enjoy this stylish server!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine E Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cheese Plate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cheese plate along with some cheese knives to give to a friend for Christmas. The plate is good quality and arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the quality, size and functionality of the piece. The item was a great price and the item shipped in secure packaging, arrived just as described and in a very short amount of time. Will definitely purchase again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ketcherside

customer_reviews.title: this is a really great price for this product
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a really great price for this product. Furthermore, I received the product very quickly and it was just as advertised. Also, I received a very nice thank you note from EMMEMO, a college kid just trying to make some money on the side. Best wishes on your degree! You got this all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs UP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful serving tray and very sturdy! Cant wait to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Skate Board serves its’ purpose
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Charcuterie Business and it does the job
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to serve snacks
customer_reviews.text: This worked very nice for a cheese plate and cleanup was a breeze. It's nice looking and sturdy. Heavy enough to slice cheese without it sliding about.
customer_reviews.author: V. Older

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Slate Board
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cheese board or dessert! Arrived in perfect condition and is just what I needed for my special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: gcollins

customer_reviews.title: Nice plate
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheese plate. Bigger than i imagined so perfect size. Has felt tabs on bottom. Arrived timely. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: RoseValley Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Stains
customer_reviews.text: The board is a good size. The issues are any soft cheese leaves a stain and doesn't come off. Also in the listing it appeared that chalk was included but it wasn't. Read up on what types of cheese leaves a dis-coloration
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Nice but......
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time but had 3 cracks in the top surface that were apparent on the bottom as well. Immediately scheduled for return as defective!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: The slate plate arrived quickly and in good condition. I love the scalloped edges
customer_reviews.text: The slate plate arrived quickly and in good condition. I love the scalloped edges! I have tried regular chalk but have not tried liquid chalk. Regular chalk works very well and the color stays loud and strong. The edges are sharp and can cut if you slide your skin also nag the edge.
customer_reviews.author: confessor

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Plate was composed of two pieces glued together, with a highly-visible seam. Returned. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a hard-to-shop-for friend
customer_reviews.text: great gift for a hard-to-shop-for friend, and it arrived in 2 days...during the week before Christmas! very impressive, Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: MM888

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived prompty
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as advertised. Maybe a little fragile. Could be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Vilas

customer_reviews.title: Slated cheese board
customer_reviews.text: I etched with last name initial & last name as a gift. Came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This round slate cheese board is a great piece to add to an appetizer table
customer_reviews.text: This round slate cheese board is a great piece to add to an appetizer table. I'm so happy to have found a round board to add some depth and interest to the table. It is perfect! Thanks Kris!

customer_reviews.title: This is item looks exactly like the picture and the size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is item looks exactly like the picture and the size is perfect. It arrived with no issues

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured - great quality. It made for a nice birthday gift!

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. I took it out of the box and it looks really nice, I'm excited to give it to her.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! It accents the dining area perfectly. Good quality everything as advertised. We love our cheese plate! And coasters!

customer_reviews.title: perfect cheese server!

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected. Planning to use as charcuterie board. Has a nice rustic appearance

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Nice quality and arrived in good condition.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed the perfect thing for my social family
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these as gifts. Seemed the perfect thing for my social family!

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I think this material breaks off easily. Mine came broken. Its nice looking but too delicate.

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. Not to thick and the size was perfect for cheese and crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to leave out on counter for family to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to leave out on counter for family to make a quick sandwich, set out cheese and crackers, or other quick snacks. Easy to wipe off, ready for next use!
customer_reviews.author: Beachgram

customer_reviews.title: and very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted to order. and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraResnick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, ships quick
customer_reviews.text: Great quality , ships quick .... looks great for new menu ty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slate cheese plate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful slate cheese plate!!! I just love it and can't wait to order more of your products!! You have amazing talent. Keep it up:)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Newman

customer_reviews.title: I love this plate
customer_reviews.text: I love this plate! it goes well with everything! I use it for pix for my blog... its part of the essentials now
customer_reviews.author: Dani Huerfano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent this cheese board as a gift and received rave reviews from the recipient!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Lambright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Appetizers!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Great for entertaining guests, easy to clean, and usually a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cheese plate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone and they loved it. Great plate and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a fire resistant stand for fire place accessories. Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Vahe A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cheese board. Looks way more expensive than it is. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jrock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a satisfactory purchase. It was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking product -- until you use it. Any soft cheese will leave an oily stain. Maybe slate isn't the best choice for a cheese plate.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Worked Like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Sunday for Xmas Eve and Xmas on Tuesday and Wednesday as I made a puff Brie and a cheese platter. It arrived 5 minutes prior to me leaving for the festivities, so I unboxed it and washed it quickly. I received many compliments on the round slate cheese board as it was the perfect size for a puff brie and held enough crackers, cheese and pepperoni for a gathering of 10 for an app. I recommend this cheese board!
customer_reviews.author: Mean Joe Green

customer_reviews.title: This cheese board appears to be an excellent purchase for its price point
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board appears to be an excellent purchase for its price point. I have only owned it about three days and have not yet used it with chalk or for service, so I can only comment on the general appearance of the item, but it does seem quite nice. It is thinner and appears less polished than other comparable items on the market, but at its significantly lower price point it is hard to beat. I am quite satisfied with my purchase to date.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Seeker 98

customer_reviews.title: Fairly thin, but does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slate to use like a trivet, and it works quite well. It arrived without damage, and has not incurred any through normal use. Being slate cleanup is easy with a damp rag, and a little olive oil does make it shine. The beveled edges will shed flakes of slate though, and it is a fairly thin slice of slate so durability may be an issue, but if you're careful it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! Just as described and wonderful quality. I'm very pleased with this purchase. Seller sent a lovely thank you; I wish more transactions went as nicely as this one. I highly recommend this item - you will be quite satisfied. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Delivery of Displayed Board
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery of advertised product. We wanted a slate cheese board large enough to serve a couple of cheeses on. That is what was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: John Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Side Table Plate/Coaster
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of the 12" diameter slate boards to place on our two side tables by our couch. Perfect! They actually serve as huge coasters and look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. The middle of the board had a huge scratch in it. Thought the legs were a bit flimsy and not attractive looking, would have been better just as a flat board. I liked that you could write on it.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle hiker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, works great
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this as a cheese platter and it works great. Super easy to write on and clean. Recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and recipient loved it. Very good description. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal and way nicer than expected. Very happy with this plate.
customer_reviews.author: Low Tess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect :)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought it to use as a cake plate and I love it. Well made and better looking than the pictures give credit. I got the 12" size.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition.A lovely cheeseboard.that you can write on

customer_reviews.title: nice solid cheese board
customer_reviews.text: love it . really nice and heavy..well made. very happy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice board. Perfect for serving cheeses and any form ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board. Perfect for serving cheeses and any form of charcuterie. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my naked Brie and it was great. Love the material and easy to clean. Also received it super fast.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's beautiful and looking kind of rustic
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's beautiful and looking kind of rustic. In terms of quality, it appears to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Morante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese plate. It is exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Plate-base for crystal healing grid
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat of a different use. I use a chalk pen and stencil to write/erase different crystal grid patterns on this slate plate as needed for energy healing. Also purchased a similar slate plate in a "lazy Susan" style as I orient my Grids to magnetic north and this enables an established grid to be reoriented, used for Reiki healing, EMF, crystal grid, IET
customer_reviews.author: ACMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty cool. Works perfect for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: JJSparky2

product_meta.title: EMEMO Square Cut Slate Coasters Set of 4 Unique 4"x4", Handmade Coasters for Drinks, Beverages, Wine Glasses - Elegant Look & Unmatched Furniture Protection - Made of Genuine Black Slate
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Square| Size:4x4 inchesAmaze Your Dinner Guests With The EMEMO Black Slate Designer Coasters! 

Make any dinner, party or home event a little more special with our slate designer coasters. Your friends and guests are bound to ask where you got these fancy coasters from! Be sure to tell them! 

Handmade Quality 

Break the monotony of factory-produced, identical items. Our slate coaster set contains 4 coasters of the same size but of unique, handcrafted pattern. Enjoy your drink while admiring the elaborate, clean-cut edges of your coaster! 

The EMEMO black slate coasters are made from the finest charcoal slate. No chemicals involved! 

Protect Your Table From Rings And Scratches 

Every individual coaster in our black coaster set comes with 4 felt bumpers, ensuring your table remains both ring-free and scratch-free! 

Easy Buy 

We aim to please our customers, and we think we are doing a good job as testified by our high rating! If you find anything wrong with our slate coasters, simply return the set within 30 days for a replacement or a full refund! 

Supply For The Unique Black Slate Coaster Set Is Low, Click Add To Cart Now!
feature_bullets: OUTSTANDING APPEARANCE: Make your dinner table or bar stand out with these gorgeous black slate coasters. If you are tired of bland or cute coasters, this EMEMO coaster set is the stylish, adult choice! Give your kitchen a touch of authenticity and uniqueness with these awesome black slate coasters.

FINEST MATERIAL AND DESIGN: The EMEMO coaster set is handcrafted with genuine black slate, and cut by hand, direct from natural charcoal! Each one is of 4’’x 4’’ size but has a unique, hard and clean pattern - Because a completely symmetric coaster set would be boring!
EASY TO CLEAN: No dust or residue involved, and you can/should easily clean any drops or spills off the coasters regularly with a simple damp cloth!

TABLE SAFE: Don’t be intimidated by the stone; our clean-cut square slate coasters come with 4 felt bumpers each! Don’t worry about the surface of your table, these coasters will leave it scratch-free!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We are confident you will love the EMEMO slate coaster set. Just read our customer reviews! That’s why we safely offer you a money back and replacement guarantee. Simply return the set within 30 days for a replacement or a full refund!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
